market.summary: Cashback with DBS new credit card
market.subject: Dbs new creditcard - DBS Swipe
market.body: Enjoy up to 7% cashback, when you pay with DBS Swipe! T&Cs apply. Till 31 Jul 2019

personal.subject: Enquiry
personal.body: Hi, I would like to check if there are any recommendation for me to earn more interest? Regards, Lim Ze Yang

personal.subject: Enquiry
personal.body: Dear Mr Lim, we will be assigning a RM to get in touch with you for actions that you can take. Thank you for banking with DBS and we hope to hear from you again!
